content: This conference is going to be a blast!

• BLAST 2022: Boolean Algebras, Lattices, Algebraic and Quantum logic, Universal Algebra, Set Theory, Set-theoretic and Point-free Topology. August 8 - 12, 2002, Chapman University, Orange, California.
You can register here "as soon as possible" to view the conference online for free, or attend in person for a fee.
I'm going to talk about Petri nets, quantales and such.
